Bachelor’s of Science Degree Undergraduate Program

Sample of Course Map

The undergraduate program gives students the full breadth of undergraduate computer science knowledge and skills while preparing them for careers in computer technology and for advanced study in graduate education.

Total Hours Required: 120 hours = General Studies(55) + Computer Science Program(48) + Free Electives(17)

All students must take at least 6 hours in Areas II and/or IV that are international in scope. Students must complete a 6-hour sequence in either literature OR history.
